Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Sweater \Sweat"er\, n. 1. One who sweats. [1913 Webster]
2. One who, or that which, causes to sweat; as: (a) A sudorific. (b) A woolen jacket or jersey worn by athletes. (c) An employer who oppresses his workmen by paying low wages. [Slang] [1913 Webster]
sweater n 1: a crocheted or knitted garment covering the upper part of the body 2: a person who perspires [syn: {perspirer}]
